interactivity.requirements: You must have seen or permanently missed the following Events: Seen Main Events up to " What Was "

progression.synopsis: Sensei calls the phone number Niki gave him, although he has to get past her manager before talking to her. He suggests meeting for breakfast. At the diner, Niki is worried about being recognised, and when Sensei suggests that this is unlikely, she bets him that the waitress will know who she is. The waitress is Kaori , who doesn't. Niki tells Sensei that although their relationship is obviously over, she would like to keep in touch with him â€” however, being seen with him could derail her career, so caution will be required. She also wants a real apology sometime, and still doesn't believe his "amnesia" story.
trivia: Niki will remember the false name ("Noodles", "Paul", or "Barack Obama") that Sensei gives to her manager, and refers to it in future events.

changelog: This Event was added in Update 0.14.
